akn:content.akn:p:
§ 22505. Exclusive right to name The corporation and its State, territorial, and local subdivisions have the exclusive right to use the name “American War Mothers”. (Pub. L. 105–225, Aug. 12, 1998, 112 Stat. 1305.)
Historical and Revision Notes
RevisedSectionSource (U.S. Code)Source (Statutes at Large)
2250536:100.Feb. 24, 1925, ch. 303, § 10, 43 Stat. 968.
The words “to have” are omitted as included in “to use”. The words “in carrying out its business purposes” are omitted as unnecessary.
